äºŒè€…çš„åŸæ–‡å¼•ç”¨ä¸ºï¼š

  • â€œMarcos SebastiÃ¡n, Richard Rivera, Platon Kotzias, and Juan Caballero. AVClass: A Tool for Massive Malware Labeling[C]. In Proceedings of the International Symposium on Research in Attacks, Intrusions and Defenses, September 2016.â€ã€‚
  • â€œSilvia SebastiÃ¡n, Juan Caballero. AVClass2: Massive Malware Tag Extraction from AV Labels[C]. In proceedings of the Annual Computer Security Applications Conference, December 2020.â€ã€‚

2ã€AVCLASS vs. AVCLASS2

AVCLASS å’Œ AVCLASS2 éƒ½ç”¨äºæ ‡æ³¨ Android malware familyã€‚ä½œè€…åŠå…¶å›¢é˜Ÿ (IMDEA Software Institute) æ¨èä½¿ç”¨å¯ä»¥æä¾›æ›´å¤šä¿¡æ¯çš„ AVCLASS2ã€‚

äºŒè€…è¾“å‡ºçš„ä¿¡æ¯å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

  • AVCLASS åªæä¾› family names (i.e.ï¼Œfamily tags)ã€‚

å¯¹äº family names è€Œè¨€ï¼ŒAVCLASS2 ä¼šè¾“å‡ºå¤šä¸ªæ‰€å± family namesï¼Œè€Œ AVCLASS åªè¾“å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªã€‚å¹¶ä¸”äºŒè€…è¾“å‡ºçš„ family name ä¹Ÿä¸ä¸€å®šç›¸åŒã€‚

ä½œè€…åœ¨ Github ä¸­ç»™å‡ºäº†è¿™æ ·çš„é™ˆè¿° â€œAVClass is no longer updated and may be deprecated in the near future. For example, we add family aliases and generic terms from time to time for AVClass2, but we are not currently adding them for AVClass.â€ã€‚

3ã€ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹ä¸€

ä¸¤ç§å·¥å…·éƒ½æ”¯æŒ VirusTotal v2 API JSON reports (-vt file)ã€‚ä»¥ä¸‹ç¤ºä¾‹ä»…ä»¥ AVCLASS2 ä¸ºä¾‹ï¼Œå¦‚ä½¿ç”¨ AVCLASS åªéœ€æ›¿æ¢ ./avclass2/avclass2_labeler.py ä¸º ./avclass/avclass_labeler.pyã€‚

entry.title: ã€ç¼–è¯‘å…æ€å››ã€‘
entry.content:
ğŸ³ Android æ£€æµ‹å·¥å…·ä¸€ ğŸ³

1ã€VirusTotal ç®€ä»‹

VirusTotal å¯ä»¥ç”¨äºæ£€æµ‹ files æˆ–è€… URLï¼Œå¹¶ç”Ÿæˆç›¸åº”çš„ reportã€‚

å¯¹äº Android application è€Œè¨€ï¼ŒVirusTotal å¯ä»¥æä¾›å¤šè¾¾ 70 ä¸ªæ€è½¯ (anti-virus tool) çš„æ£€æµ‹ç»“æœåŠç›¸åº”çš„ reportã€‚

2ã€VirusTotal ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹å¼

VirusTotal çš„ python åº“ä¸º vt ï¼Œå®˜æ–¹æ–‡æ¡£ä¸º VirusTotal API v3 referenceã€‚

åœ¨ ç”³è¯· å¾—åˆ° VirusTotal çš„ API åï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ è°ƒç”¨ python åº“ çš„æ–¹å¼ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ å®˜æ–¹æ–‡æ¡£ç¤ºä¾‹ çš„æ–¹å¼è¿›è¡Œ malware detectionã€‚

æœ¬æ–‡æ ¹æ®å®˜æ–¹æ–‡æ¡£ç¤ºä¾‹å±•å¼€ä»‹ç»ï¼Œå…±åˆ†ä¸ºä»¥ä¸‹å››æ­¥ï¼š

  • æ­¥éª¤ä¸€ï¼Œè·å– API keyã€‚
  • æ­¥éª¤äºŒï¼Œè·å– malware MD5ã€‚
  • æ­¥éª¤ä¸‰ï¼Œè·å– report æ‰€éœ€çš„ URLã€‚
  • æ­¥éª¤å››ï¼Œæ ¹æ®ä»¥ä¸Šä¸‰è€…å®Œæˆä»£ç å¹¶æ£€æµ‹ã€‚

3ã€æ­¥éª¤ä¸€

è·å– API keyã€‚å‚è€ƒåšå®¢ Python ä»£ç å®ç°è®¿é—® VirusTotalï¼Œè·å–æ€è½¯ç»“æœ ã€‚

æœ¬æ–‡ä½¿ç”¨ VirusTotal ä¸º Cuckoo Sandbox æä¾›çš„ API key cuckoo vt API key ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤ºã€‚

    a0283a2c3d55728300d064874239b5346fb991317e8449fe43c902879d******

4ã€æ­¥éª¤äºŒ

è·å– malware MD5ã€‚å‚è€ƒåšå®¢ æ‰¹é‡ç”Ÿæˆæ–‡ä»¶å¤¹å†…æ‰€æœ‰æ–‡ä»¶ md5 ã€‚

åšå®¢ä½œè€…åŸºäº windows å‘½ä»¤ç¼–å†™äº†ä¸€ä¸ªæ‰¹é‡ç”Ÿæˆ MD5 å€¼çš„è„šæœ¬ã€‚æŠŠä»¥ä¸‹ä»£ç æ”¾å…¥ get_md5.bat æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­ï¼Œå†æŠŠ get_md5.bat æ”¾å…¥éœ€è¦æ‰¹é‡ç”Ÿæˆ MD5 çš„æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹å†…ã€‚è¿è¡Œ get_md5.bat æ–‡ä»¶å³å¯å¾—åˆ°å­˜å‚¨å½“å‰æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹å†…æ‰€æœ‰æ–‡ä»¶ MD5 å€¼çš„ MD5.txt æ–‡ä»¶ã€‚

    title md5æ‰¹é‡ç”Ÿæˆè„šæœ¬-by miles    setlocal enabledelayedexpansion    %~d0    cd %~dp0    if exist 1234.txt del 1234.txt    for /R %%s in (.,*) do (    echo %%s    ) >>1234.txt    if exist md5.txt del md5.txt    for /f "skip=1" %%a in (1234.txt) do certutil -hashfile %%a MD5>>md5.txt         echo md5ç”Ÿæˆå®Œæ¯•

5ã€æ­¥éª¤ä¸‰

è·å– report æ‰€éœ€çš„ URLï¼š

  • VirusTotal v2 APIï¼Œ'https://www.virustotal.com/vtapi/v2/file/report?resource={}&apikey={}'.format(md5, apikey)ï¼Œå‚è€ƒåšå®¢ Python ä»£ç å®ç°è®¿é—® VirusTotalï¼Œè·å–æ€è½¯ç»“æœ ã€‚
  • VirusTotal v3 APIï¼Œ'https://www.virustotal.com/api/v3/files/{}'.format(md5)ï¼Œå‚è€ƒ VT api Objects ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹å›¾æ‰€ç¤ºï¼š

6ã€æ­¥éª¤å››

æ ¹æ® MD5ã€API key å’Œ URL å®Œæˆä»£ç å¹¶æ£€æµ‹ (ç”Ÿæˆ report)ã€‚é¢„æœŸç”Ÿæˆä¸€ä¸ª æ ¼å¼åŒ– (ä¸€è¡Œ) åçš„ json æ–‡ä»¶ ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œè®¾å®šä¸ºä¸€è¡Œæ˜¯ä¸ºäº†ä¾¿äºæ¥ä¸‹æ¥ ä½¿ç”¨ AVCLASS2 æ ‡æ³¨ malware family name ã€‚

ç¤ºä¾‹ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

    import json    import requests    # settings    apikey = "a0283a2c3d55728300d064874239b5346fb991317e8449fe43c902879d******"  # cuckoo vt api key    md5 = "5e31d16d6bf35ea117d6d2c4d42ea879"  # md5    url = 'https://www.virustotal.com/api/v3/files/{}'.format(md5)  # url    # get report    session = requests.Session()    session.headers = {'X-Apikey': apikey}    response = session.get(url)  # requests.models.Response    json_data = json.loads(response.text)  # str (response.text) to dict (json_data)    # save report by json, one line show    with open('./report.json', 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:        json.dump(json_data, f)

æ‰€å¾—æ–‡ä»¶å¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤ºï¼š

7ã€VirusTotal ä¸‹è½½ Android malware

åŸºäº VirusTotal ä¸‹è½½ Android malware å¯å‚è€ƒ Cuckoo virustotal.py å’Œ ä» virustotal ä¸Šä¸‹è½½ç—…æ¯’æ ·æœ¬ ã€‚

4ã€AndroZoo app year

AndroZoo app year åˆ†å¸ƒå¦‚å›¾ 2 æ‰€ç¤ºã€‚é™¤ 1980 å¹´ä¹‹å¤–å‡ºç° app æœ€å¤š (1770202) çš„ year ä¸º 2014 å¹´ã€‚æœ‰æ¥è¿‘ä¸€åŠçš„ Google Play ä¸­çš„ app çš„æ—¶é—´æ ‡æ³¨ä¸º 1980ã€‚

5ã€AndroZoo app download

ä½¿ç”¨ python æä¾›çš„åŒ… azoo (pip install azoo) é…åˆ AndroZoo æä¾›çš„ API KEY (é‚®ä»¶ç”³è¯·)ï¼Œå³å¯ä¸‹è½½æ•°æ®ã€‚éƒ¨åˆ†å‚æ•°å¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤ºã€‚

    '--number', '-n', type=click.INT, help='Number of apks to download.'    '--dexdate', '-d', help='The date on a dex file, format %Y-%m-%d, e.g. 2015-10-03.'    '--apksize', '-s', help='Apk size, in bytes.'    '--vtdetection', '-vt', help='Virus total rating, integer.'    '--pkgname', '-pn', help='Package names.'    '--markets', '-m', help='Markets, e.g. play.google.com. Possible values (can differ, since repository is updating): 1mobile,angeeks,anzhi,apk_bang,appchina,fdroid,freewarelovers,genome,hiapk,markets,mi.com,play.google.com,proandroid,slideme,torrents.'    '--sha256', help='SHA256 hashes of apks to download.'    '--sha1', help='SHA1 hashes of apks to download.'    '--md5', help='MD5 hashes of apks to download.'    '--metadata', '-md', help='Metadata. This is a subset of latest.csv column names to keep in metadata.csv. By default sha256,pkg_name,apk_size,dex_date,markets.'    '--out', '-o', help='Output folder name. By default current directory.'    '--seed', '-sd', type=click.INT, help='Seed for a random algorithm.'    '--key', '-k', help='Androzoo api key.'    '--input-file', '-i', help='Path to input csv.'    '--threads', '-t', type=click.INT, default=4, help='Number of threads for concurrent download. 4 by default.'

æ³¨ï¼šå…¶ä¸­ dexdate, apksize and vtdetection require specifying lower and upper bounds in format lower:upper, both inclusive.ã€‚

6ã€AndroZoo app download ç¤ºä¾‹

1ã€Androguard â€” Windows å®‰è£…

Windows å·²ç»é¢„è£… python 3.6.2ï¼Œconda 4.6.11ï¼Œpycharmï¼Œjdk 1.8.0_101 ç­‰ç¯å¢ƒå’Œå·¥å…·ã€‚

å®‰è£…é GUI ç‰ˆæœ¬çš„ Androguardï¼Œç›´æ¥ pip install androguard å³å¯ã€‚å…¶ä¸­å¯èƒ½ä¼šæœ‰æŸäº›åŒ…ç‰ˆæœ¬æŠ¥é”™ã€‚ä½†åªè¦ä¸å½±å“ä¸»è¦åŠŸèƒ½æ‰§è¡Œï¼Œå¯å¿½ç•¥æ­¤ç±» errorã€‚

2ã€Androguard ä½¿ç”¨

entry.title: ã€ç¼–è¯‘å…æ€ä¸€ã€‘
entry.content:
ğŸ³ Android åç¼–è¯‘å·¥å…· Androguard ä½¿ç”¨ç®€ä»‹ ğŸ³

1ã€Androguard â€” Android decompiling tool

Androguard is a full python tool to play with Android files. It is designed to work with Python 3 only.

- DEX, ODEX- APK- Androidâ€™s binary xml- Android resources- Disassemble DEX/ODEX bytecodes- Decompiler for DEX/ODEX files

å…¶å®˜æ–¹æ–‡æ¡£ä¸º Andruguard documentation ã€‚

æœ€æ–°ç‰ˆæœ¬çš„ Androguard (update on 24 Nov 2020) é›†æˆäº† axplorer (å¯¹åº”æä¾›äº† API-permission mapping of Android API level 25)ã€‚è€Œ Androguard è‡ªèº«åˆ™æ›´æ–°è‡³ Android API level 28ã€‚

2ã€Androguard å®‰è£…

Linux OS ä¸‹å®‰è£…ï¼š

4.2 å¯èƒ½å‡ºç°çš„ error

å¦å¤–ï¼Œéœ€æ³¨æ„ Git çš„ä¸€äº›ç›¸å…³æ“ä½œå¦‚ åˆ‡æ¢åˆ†æ”¯æ“ä½œã€æ’¤é”€ â€œcommitâ€ å’Œ â€œaddâ€ ä»¥åŠ â€œgit pullâ€ åŒæ­¥è¿œç¨‹ä¸æœ¬åœ°ï¼ˆmergeï¼‰ç­‰ã€‚
